sentences.en: A good teacher should implant high ideals in children.
sentences.cn: 好教师应该把高尚理想灌输给孩子们.

sentences.en: By day 11 the ovum begins to attach and implant in the lining of the uterus.
sentences.cn: 到第11天卵子着床嵌入子宫内壁.

sentences.en: Early experiences can implant fears in the subconscious.
sentences.cn: 早年的经历会在下意识中埋入恐惧感.

sentences.en: If adequate bone quantity is provided, using wide - diameter implant should be better.
sentences.cn: 当颌骨颊舌径足够时, 以大直径种植体修复为佳.

sentences.en: In this operation the surgeons implant a new lens ( in the eye ).
sentences.cn: 医生在这次手术中给病人 ( 眼球 ) 植入了新的水晶体.

sentences.en: Joe: But things obviously changed after she got her ear implant.
sentences.cn: 乔: 但她耳朵做了植入手术之后,情况显然改变啦.

sentences.en: Light microscope examination of the implant sites showed no evidence of toxicity.
sentences.cn: 光植入物网站显微镜检查无明显毒性的证据.

sentences.en: Meanwhile , the automatization and efficiency the implant test is improved by ESIT.
sentences.cn: 结果表明, 该系统运行可靠,性能稳定,提高了插销试验的自动化程度及工作效率.

sentences.en: Nowadays, pure titanium has been widely used as an implant material.
sentences.cn: 纯钛是目前广泛应用于临床的人工种植牙植入材料.

sentences.en: Results: Follow - up post - prosthesis were mean 11 months, no implant lost.
sentences.cn: 结果: 所有病例修复后平均追踪11个月, 未见种植体脱落.

sentences.en: Should we shun an implant that enhances brain development in newborns?
sentences.cn: 我们不该为了加强新生儿脑部发育而移植?

sentences.en: Surgeons successfully implanted an artificial hip.
sentences.cn: 外科医生成功地植入了一个人工髋关节。

sentences.en: The anchor implant showed good stability in two situations.
sentences.cn: 两种连接方式下,支枕种植体均显示出良好的德定性.

sentences.en: The diagram implanted a dangerous prejudice firmly in the minds of countless economics students.
sentences.cn: 该图表在无数经济学学生的头脑中牢牢地灌输了一种危险的偏见。

sentences.en: The operation to implant the artificial heart took two hours.
sentences.cn: 人工心脏植入手术花费了两小时.

sentences.en: We can implant many detectors over an area which is large enough.
sentences.cn: 我们能在足够大的范围内安置许多检波器.

phrases.tran_cn: 人工耳蜗；耳蜗植入；耳郭灌输治疗

trans.tran_cn: [医]移植物，植入管，移植的组织
trans.tran_en: something artificial that is put into someone’s body in a medical operation
to strongly fix an idea, feeling, attitude etc in someone’s mind or character
